sources.title: The Roaring Road
sources.description: A young man (Wallace Reid) pursues a young lady (Ann Little) with the same energy he applies to his other obsession in life, auto racing.

sources.title: The Roaring Road
sources.description: Title: The Roaring Road Summary: A young man pursues a young lady with the same energy he applies to his other obsession in life, auto racing. Directed by: James Cruze Actors: Wallace Reid, Ann Little, Theodore Roberts Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 27 April 1919 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 A young man pursues a young lady with the same energy he applies to his other obsession in life, auto racing.
